description[String]: Find your mailbox and open it.
Close your mailbox to collect a special item.
1 of 3 found
2 of 3 found
Assemble the Map of Adventurers onto the central table.
Interact with the central table to access the Map of Adventures.
Press [Play] on the Map to begin an adventure.
Complete "Beast Control" and claim its reward.
Press [T] to summon a portal back to the tavern.
Take portal back to the tavern and claim your reward.
Protect heedless travellers by defeating beasts nearby the tavern.
Secure the tavern's river crossings by defeating whelps.
Investigate the mine and clear it of all undead.
Press [H] to improve your character.
Press [i] to open your inventory and equip the new item you've earned.
Access the Map of Adventures and begin Winged Waterways.
Defeat whelps to secure river crossings
Press [T] to summon the portal and then return to the tavern.
Access the Map of Adventures and begin The Undead.
Clear the mine of all undead.
Access the crafting room, now that you have a key.
Interact with the anvil to access equipment crafting.
Interact with the cauldron to access potion crafting.
Reach character level 5.
Reach character level 8.
Access the crafting room.
Interact with the cauldron to access potion crafting.
Make a potion to fill your empty slot.
Visit <unnamedville> and help solve a mystery.
Go to town square and check out the harvest parade.
What's got the mayor upset? Talk to him and find out.
Search for clues as to the disappearence of Phillip.
Follow the fresh trail left by no-gooders.
Find a way into the encampment.
Locate Phillip, the pig with an outie bellie-button.
Locate Phillip, the pig with an outie bellie-button.
The harvest festival is saved, thanks to you!
Use the portal scroll and return to the manor.
Open the shop and buy an Incense.
Pick the book corresponding to your favorite ability.
Choose any sitting place and sit down.
Spend the Incense and upgrade the ability.
Go behind the bar and take an empty cup.
Fill the cup at one of the barrel filling stations.
Interact with the bar to serve the drink.
Go to Pinball Pirates and begin a game.
Play a round of Pinball Pirates until you run out of balls.
Go to the dining room and pick up a chair.
Throw the chair.
Hit someone with a chair.
Go to the poker table and have a seat.
Begin playing a round of poker.
Win a round of Tavern Hold'em.

The Demon tricked you, to get you out of his hair. Teleport back to the tavern.
